display.title: Philosopher's Stone
display.description:
Your starting point for Project E.

Through crafting with the Philosopher's Stone (press C), you have discovered that the intense heat created when crafting can allow you to smelt 7 dusts or ores with a catalyst (namely charcoal or coal).

The Philosopher's Stone will also allow you to transmute dirt into sand and sand into grass. Stone can become cobblestone and likewise. Charging it (press V to charge, shift-V to discharge) will affect a wider area.

Used to craft a variety of alchemical items and materials, the Philosopher's Stone is not consumed in the process.
